General.Name: Síminn hf
General.Description: Síminn hf. provides communication solutions in Iceland and internationally. The company operates through Mobile, Fixed Voice, Internet and Network, TV, Equipment Sales, and Other segments. It also offers mobile services; fixed voice services; data services, including xDSL service, GPON, internet, IP net, core network, local loop, and access network; TV broadcast and distribution services; and IT and finance services, as well as sells telecommunication equipment. In addition, the company sells products online. Síminn hf. was founded in 1906 and is based in Reykjavík, Iceland.

1.Name: Mr. Óskar  Hauksson
1.Title: CFO and Director of Fin. & Admin.
